original: LITHANDER, Patrick Edvard, Herr, Bollebygd, f Gbg 10/12 16 av dir o riksd.m Edv L 0 Mabel Mc Clure-Williams, gm Brita Aurell. 1 ring hal, Gbgs hdlsinst 34. Anst P Em Lithander & Co Gbg 34—39, vkst dir AB Textilkomp, Bollebygd, sed. 39, deläg dta. Stud.-resor: Engl, Tyskl, Frankr, Ital, Holl, Belg, USA mfl.
translated: LITHANDER, Patrick Edvard, Mr., Bollebygd, b. Gbg 10/12 16, son of director and member of Parliament Edvard L and Mabel Mc Clure-Williams. Married to Brita Aurell. Father of one child, a boy. Started working at Gbg's trade institution in 1934. Employed at Em Lithander & Co Gbg 34-39, promoted to managing director of AB Textilkomp in Bollebygd since 1939, and part-owner of the company. Took study trips to England, Germany, France, Italy, the Netherlands, Belgium, USA, and others.

structured.name: Patrick Edvard Lithander
structured.description: Patrick Edvard Lithander was a Swedish businessman and politician.
